context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute bulk actions to improve efficiency in their tasks.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Improve efficiency in handling tasks.
description: Allow power users to execute bulk actions (e.g., imports or batch updates) to improve efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a bulk operation.
preconditions: Power user has access to bulk operation features.
postconditions: System reflects the changes made by the bulk operations.
assumptions: The system includes functionality for bulk operations.
Power user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations to enhance efficiency.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. Power user selects bulk operation option → System displays available bulk operations.
2. Power user specifies the details for the bulk operation → System validates the input.
3. Power user confirms the bulk operation → System executes the bulk operation.
4. System displays success message and updated data.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts for correction.
information_for_steps: 2. Input details for the bulk operation
